channel.title: Coding on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GPT-5.3-Codex is now generally available for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub Copilot is rolling out general availability of OpenAI’s GPT-5.3-Codex model.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Claude Opus 4.5 Available in Microsoft Foundry
item.description:
Claude Opus 4.5 is available in public preview on Microsoft Foundry for Azure customers, introducing improvements in coding, agentic workflows, and enterprise productivity with upgraded performance and versatility.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Claude Opus 4.5 is in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
Anthropic’s Claude Opus 4.5 is now rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot; early tests show it outperforms internal coding benchmarks while cutting token usage roughly in half.

  • Source: GitHub
